item.title: Is Miami the Most Underrated ‘Real Housewives’ Franchise? NBCU Unscripted Exec and EP Weigh In
item.description: Matt Anderson and Kathleen French chat with The Hollywood Reporter about how they rebooted the once-paused show and season seven’s uncomfortable drink throw.
